mapper.select: select comment_number, comment_text, comment_date, comment_monitor_num, article_num, c.user_num, user_nick from tbl_user u join tbl_comment c on article_num = #{commentNum} and u.user_num = c.user_num order by comment_date DESC
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_comment(comment_num, comment_text, article_num, user_num) values(seq_comment.nextVal, #{commentText}, #{articleNum}, #{userNum})
